Reviews.Title: it is a great phone(hardware wise), but might need a little time to fix some of the bugs(software wise)
Reviews.Author: Chloe Wong
Reviews.Content: I have been using padfone 2 for almost half year. Infinity is not much different from padfone 2 except resolutions and its appearance.As usual Asus product, the hardware is great, but the software is buggy. If you have no interest in fixing things, this might not be the right phone for you. As out of the box, you might find it very frustrating to fix the connectivity problem especially for countries doesn't have this phone sold locally. if you are into technology, this phone definitely has lots of fun and build in tools. Once it is configured properly, this phone works great.

Reviews.Title: Excellent device!!!
Reviews.Author: Yauhan Kotau
Reviews.Content: It is the best phone I have ever seen. Fast, pretty and stylish. I have no problems since buying a month ago.

Reviews.Title: One of the Best!
Reviews.Author: Stefan Felzen
Reviews.Content: This Smartphone and Tablet is one of the best on the market , i love it!But a littlebit expensive.

Reviews.Title: Thank You .
Reviews.Author: Hani Abdullah AL-Garmoushi
Reviews.Content: The ASUS Padfone Infinity Tablet and Phone was good as expected.The ASUS Padfone Infinity Tablet and Phone was good as expected.The ASUS Padfone Infinity Tablet and Phone was good as expected. Thank You ..

Reviews.Title: Perfect Concept of Padfone Infinity
Reviews.Author: Hermann Kosse
Reviews.Content: It's exactly what was expected. The antenna seems to be weaker than others but it is ok as long as the net is not at the lowest limmit.

Reviews.Title: Good job
Reviews.Author: AbuHamza
Reviews.Content: This phone is great but haven't used it long since I have just replaced it with the new one A86..Good phone and idea..But hope to get rid of the lagging ,sometimes, when switching between phone and tablet..
